name: VRobot
0:
”Alexa , open v robot”
”Alexa , ask v robot to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask v robot to stop cleaning”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: v. robot
des:
Veavon robot helps you release your hands from housework. You can control your robot vacuum cleaner via voice. To get started, firstly make sure you have an Veavon Robot App and your robot is connected and online. Then, Arouse V Robot's account binding card by saying "open v robot" to aleax.In the end,you can use the following statement to control your robot after completing the account binding flow.

Alexa, ask v robot to start cleaning
Alexa, ask v robot to stop cleaning
Alexa, ask v robot to go home
